item.title: Backup iphone to an external harddrive
item.description: If your computer free space is not enough for backing up your iphone, you can use an external harddrive. You can find an instruction. Directory name and an example of command line directory name command line Progress directory name Your iphone backup can be found in iTunes > Preferences > Devices iTunes
